Page.ProductDescriptionText: Take a step ahead of your mates with these women's Air Max 90s from Nike - totally exclusive to JD. It's impossible to know trainers and not know the Air Max 90. This classic shoe's silhouette is both unmistakable and unmissable, while the colourway is crisp yet subtle. Featuring the iconic visible Air unit to the midsole, you can see the comfort these trainers are going to provide you with every stride - and trust us, you'll appreciate it. Mesh ventilation throughout the upper provides extra ventilation and breathability to help keep your feet cool and fresh. Leather overlays crossing the midsole bring increased durability and support for when you need it most. And with a waffle tread, you're getting the expert traction and grip you'd expect from a Nike Air Max 90.
